author: gstein
msg: Convert the OPTIONS handling code to use HANDLER->SLINE and LOCATION.
Remove the duplicative options_response_ctx.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/options.c:
(svn_ra_serf__options_context_t): remove STATUS_CODE. add
HEADERS_PROCESSED so that our response handler doesn't have to
process the headers on every network packet. add HANDLER member so
we can reach it when we just have this context.
(struct options_response_ctx_t): removed. the normal context has
these three fields, so just use that instead.
(capabilities_headers_iterator_callback): the baton is now an
OPT_CTX. grab SESSION to simplify the rest of the code.
(options_response_handler): the baton is now an OPT_CTX. check the
HEADERS_PROCESSED flag to avoid re-processing the headers.
(svn_ra_serf__create_options_req): don't bother with an
OPTIONS_RESPONSE_CTX_T. store the HANDLER for later use. adjust
the baton for the response handler.
(svn_ra_serf__exchange_capabilities): use HANDLER fields instead of
our custom status code and the parser's LOCATION field.
